title: Chris Marrs
description: One of Pete's funniest and oldest friends from Chicago (continuing our CHICAGO week!) CHRIS MARRS came by the studio to make it weird and talk about their old improv team, being couple friends with Pete's ex-wife (weird!), commercial acting, writing, and bit and laughs abound. One of Pete's all time favorite people, we're so glad he could come by and GET INTO IT. Now it's your turn, weirdos! Please enjoy.
